summary: Backpack application where users can store, view, and manage items like organizing a digital backpack.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Backpack logo mark, flat vector style (backpack-logo.dim_512x512.png)
- Seamless camping/gear pattern background, subtle, low-contrast (backpack-pattern.dim_1600x900.png)
- Set of 6 simple item category icons (clothing, toiletries, electronics, documents, food, misc), monochrome (backpack-icons.dim_512x512.png)

existing_features.title: Implement Internet Identity sign-in and ensure all backpack data is scoped to the authenticated user (by Principal).
Build the core UI to view and manage backpack items: add item form, items list, item detail/edit, delete, and packed/unpacked toggle.
Add list utilities: search by name, filter by packed/unpacked, and sort (e.g., by name and by recently updated).
Add a lightweight summary view that helps users understand their backpack at a glance (counts and packing progress).
Use React Query for all backend data fetching/mutations and provide loading, error, and retry states for item operations.
Apply a coherent visual theme for the app (colors, typography, layout) with a distinct style and consistent components across pages; avoid a blue/purple default palette.
Add basic onboarding/help copy in English that explains what the digital backpack is and how to use packed/unpacked toggles and item management.

new_feature_requests.summary: Build a backpack application to store, view, and manage backpack items.
Create a backend data model and API to store and manage backpack items per user, including create, read/list, update, delete operations.
